BarberShop


this application improves the experience of a barber to manage his clients and appointments.
 On our platform you can discover the best way to book an appointment and then seamlessly pay and tip.
 In addition, we built a management system for barbers and shop owners to effectively run their business and get new customers.
 
 Getting Started:
 
 These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your android device for development and testing purposes.
 See deployment for notes on how to deploy the project on a live system.
 
 Prerequisites:
 
 Download barberShop application and install it.
 
 At the initial login you will sign up for the app.
 
 example:
 
 first name: israel
 last name: israely
 user name: israelvo
 email: israelvo@gmail.com
 password: 123456
 city: laplend
 street: eraivesaran
 
 wait until the registration process is done and you get the message - successfully signed up with (your user name).
 
 
 Built With:
 
 Android Studio - The Official IDE for Android.
 Fire Base - Google's mobile platform that helps you quickly develop high-quality apps and grow your business.
